tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable dormitory stays and versatile hall rentals.
chapaGateway: Integrated with Chapa payment gateway for reliable transactions.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
powerfulManagement: Comprehensive admin panel for easy management.

individualUserNote: Individual users can book dormitories directly without registration.

fillFormToBookDormitory: Please fill out the form below to request a dormitory booking.

selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
selectBankPlaceholder: Select the bank you will transfer from

dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received. Please make the payment transfer and submit proof via Telegram as instructed. Your booking will be confirmed after verification.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been received and is pending approval. You will be notified once it's processed.
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
selectDateRangePrompt: Select your desired dates to check availability and book a room.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Error fetching dormitory details. Please try again.
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Room {roomNumber} is currently set as unavailable by administration. Please contact support.
fillFormToBookFacility: Please fill out the form below to request a facility booking.
anySpecialRequests: Any special requirements or notes for your booking?
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an error submitting your booking. Please try again.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
selectDateAndFilterFacility: Select your dates and filter by type to find available halls and sections.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Could not fetch hall and section data.
noItemsAvailable: No halls or sections are currently available based on your criteria.
loginAsCompanyToBook: Please log in as an approved company representative to book.
pleaseSelectItemsToBook: Please select one or more items to book.
fillFormToBookSelectedItems: Complete the form to book the selected facilities for the chosen date range.
itemNotAvailableErrorMultiBook: {itemName} is no longer available for the selected dates and has been removed from your selection.
itemNotFoundDatabase: {itemName} could not be found in our database. It has been removed from your selection.
errorFetchingItemDetailsMulti: Error fetching details for {itemName}. It has been removed from your selection.
noItemsSelectedForBooking: No items were selected for booking.
noValidItemsForBooking: No valid items could be loaded for booking. Please try selecting again.
accountPendingApprovalMultiBook: Your company account is still pending approval. You cannot book facilities until your account is approved.
selectDateRangeFirstTooltip: Please select a date range to enable booking.
selectItemsFirstTooltip: Please select one or more items to book.
bookSelectedItemsTooltip: Book the selected items for the chosen date range.
pleaseSelectDateRangeToEnableBooking: Please select a date range to enable booking.
loginToBookMultipleDesc: To select and book multiple halls or sections, please log in as an approved company representative.
noItemsCurrentlyMatchFilters: No items match your current filter and date selection.
dateRangeRequired: Date range with start and end dates is required.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: Error calculating total cost. Please check your inputs.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate price for the selected item.
errorCheckingAvailability: An error occurred while checking availability. Please try again.
itemUnavailableConflict: Sorry, {itemName} is not available for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: Sorry, all beds in {roomName} are booked for the selected dates.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: Dormitory capacity is not configured. Booking cannot proceed.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is currently set as unavailable by administration. It cannot be booked at this time.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory room more than once for the same start date with the same phone number. If you need to modify an existing booking, please contact support.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (index) is required for this operation. Please contact support or check server logs if you are an administrator.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A check for duplicate bookings could not be performed due to a database configuration issue. Your booking will proceed, but please ensure this is not a duplicate. Administrators: please check Firestore console for index creation link in server logs.
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a date range to view dormitories available during that period.
checkingAvailabilityForRange: Checking availability for the selected range...
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: No dormitories are available for the selected date range. Please try different dates.
noDormitoriesConfigured: No dormitories are currently configured in the system.
noFacilitiesAvailableInDateRange: No halls or sections are available for the selected date range and filter. Please try different dates or broaden your filter.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Follow the instructions below to complete your booking.
paymentReferenceNote: IMPORTANT: When making the transfer, please use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference or reason. This is crucial for us to match your payment to your booking.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: IMPORTANT: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference for your bank transfer.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the bank transfer, please send a screenshot or photo of your payment receipt to our Telegram bot: {botUsername}. Include your booking ID and the phone number ({phoneNumber}) you used for the booking in your message.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: Once you send proof, our admin team will verify your payment and confirm your booking. You will receive a confirmation message.
missingBookingId: Missing booking ID. Cannot display payment details.
errorFetchingBookingDetails: Error fetching booking details. Please try again or contact support.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking, or it has already been processed. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Further details are below.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: We have received your booking request. Please proceed to make the bank transfer and send your payment proof via our Telegram bot for verification.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your request! We have received your booking for the facility. Our team will review it and get back to you with approval status and payment details shortly.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please contact support if this issue persists.
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your active dormitory bookings using your phone number.

errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings. Please try again.

contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific inquiries related to dormitory rooms within these buildings or key collection/return:
generalInquiriesDesc: For hall/section bookings, general information, or other assistance:
addressPlaceholder: P.O. Box 123, Main St, City, Oromia, Ethiopia
mapPlaceholder: Google Maps embed will be here.

registrationPendingMessage: Your company registration is currently pending approval. You will be notified once it's reviewed. You cannot access the dashboard or make bookings until approved.
registrationRejectedMessage: We regret to inform you that your company registration has been rejected. Please check your email for more details or contact support if you believe this is an error.
contactSupportForAssistance: Please contact support for further assistance.
statusUnknownMessage: We could not determine the status of your company account. Please contact support.
errorFetchingYourBookings: Error fetching your bookings. Please try again.
accountPendingApprovalBookFacility: Your company account is pending approval. You cannot book facilities until approved.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement is not applicable for this type of booking.
providerAddressPlaceholder: Oromia Education Training Center, Main Campus, City
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified. Late payments may incur penalties.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than [X] days prior to the event date will result in forfeiture of [Y]% of the total cost. Cancellations made less than [Z] days prior will result in forfeiture of the full amount.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Use of Facility: Client agrees to use the facility only for the purpose stated in the booking. Any damages to the facility or equipment will be the responsibility of the client.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Catering: If catering services are included, final guest count must be provided [N] days prior to the event. Changes after this period may not be accommodated or may incur additional charges.
thankYouForBusiness: Thank you for choosing Oromia Education Training Center!
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement is not available or applicable for this booking's current status.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter or paste custom agreement terms here. These will replace the default terms shown below.
editTermsNote: Note: Any changes saved here will apply to the printable version of this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: The agreement for this booking is not yet ready for viewing or has not been sent by the admin.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as the company representative who made this booking to view the agreement.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.

pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer in use. Payment proof submission is handled via Telegram as per instructions on the payment details page.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services and facilities.
scanForBrochureDesc: Get quick access to our offerings.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure and well-maintained dormitory rooms perfect for students and trainees, offering a conducive environment for learning and rest.
brochureHallsDesc: Spacious halls and flexible sections suitable for conferences, workshops, meetings, and various events, equipped with modern amenities.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and customizable catering options, including lunch and refreshment services, to complement your events and training sessions.
brochureAboutUsContent: Welcome to {siteName}, a leading center for educational research and training in the Oromia region. We are dedicated to providing high-quality facilities and services to support learning, development, and collaboration. Our center offers a range of rental options, from comfortable dormitories for individuals to versatile halls and sections for organizational events, all designed to meet your needs.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and many more amenities to make your stay or event comfortable and productive.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff and excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and creating a conducive environment.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We look forward to hosting you or your event. Contact us for more information or to make a booking.
brochureSubtitle: Your Premier Choice for Dormitory and Hall Rentals in Oromia.
registerKeyholderDescription: Create a new keyholder account. Admins and Super Admins can perform this action.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyKeyholderPage: This page is accessible only by Administrators or Super Administrators.
